otherNames: Bonjour♪Sweet Love Patisserie, Bonkoi, Bonjour: Koiaji Patisserie, Bonjour♪恋味パティスリー
synopsis: The original story follows Sayuri Haruno, a girl who attends an elite confectionery school Fleurir on a scholarship to follow her dream to open a pastry shop. There she meets several charming young men.
